co2-calculation:
Wert f端r fresh mussel aus culture aus Studie f端r 100kg Muscheln mit Schale. Wert f端r 1kg durch 100 dividieren.

fresh mussel from cultivation (including cultivation, processing, consumption (macht nur sehr wenig aus) : 
95.08kg CO2 eq / 100 = 0.95 kg CO2 eq/kg
other-references: 1. Blonk et al. 2008 Milieueffecten van Nederlandse consumptie van eiwitrijke producten. Blonk Milieu Advies in opdracht van VROM -> page 24, table 3.3 =  1.9 kg CO2/kg, not sure if the CO2-end value includes the mussel shell, wild caught mussel
references: Iribarren, D.; 2010; Revisiting the Life Cycle Assessment of mussels from a sectorial perspective, table 6
name: Muscheln
comments: Is the assumption here that of 1kg mussels the shell weighs 900 g?
